biography: Simo is a formidable competitor, a member of Hirsala Golf, and a three-time winner of the prestigious Hector Trophée.  His record speaks for itself; a testament to his dedication and skill on the course.

Simo’s competitive fire is undeniable. While known for his colorful language on the course, he channels that intensity into exceptional focus and precision. His strategic prowess and unwavering determination have secured him three Hector Trophée titles, including victories in 2021, 2022, and an earlier edition of the event.  He’s also a regular competitor, having participated in the tournament since 2022.

Despite his impressive Hector Trophée record, Simo remains hungry for more wins.  His consistent appearances demonstrate a deep commitment to this event, and it’s clear that he savors the challenge. While the Victor trophy still eludes him, Simo’s remarkable skill and competitive spirit make him a perennial threat at the Hector Trophée and a player to watch each year.
